description:
Convert use of int ms to TimeDelta in files owned by bulach.

BUG=108171
TEST=


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=118502

messages.text: I've updated these files and forcibly included base/time.h in provider_impl.h.  You mentioned that different build modes may or may not include base/time.h.  For safety, we should probably run the alternate build modes before submitting.  And I suppose because this is a new review, it will need a new LGTM as appropriate.

lgtm

the first set of failures was due my wrong param for "trychange.py": I used -p0, should've been -p1.

the second set of failures seem unrelated, and looks like it built everything.

Ted, many thanks for keeping up with these bots!! :)
Just to confirm, I have authorization to commit this patch now?

On 2012/01/20 16:47:22, tedv wrote:
> Just to confirm, I have authorization to commit this patch now?

yes, please! I won't be around for much too long to watch it cycle, but feel free to land if you're going to be!
otherwise, I can put on the CQ monday morning GMT..

https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/tedvessenes@gmail.com/9195028/1
